item.description: Mason Tyler Trio is playing at the Post Office Pub in North Grafton! Singing & Playing all the classics from the 60's, 70's and the 80's. Let's get together for this event, guaranteed a great time! They play from 8 pm to 11:30 pm. Anyone interested in meeting for dinner here at 7:30 pm, please specify that in your reply. Enough interest in dinner too and I'll make reservations. Otherwise join us for some GREAT music!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Hostess for the Meetup Group / Linda
item.name: MASON TYLER TRIO -You'll Love Them!
